parameters.name: AlertType
parameters.description: The risk type.

parameters.name: AlertTypeMds
parameters.description: The internal code of the risk type.

parameters.name: AttCk
parameters.description: att&ck.

parameters.name: EventTransferExt
parameters.description: The extended information about event generation. If eventTransferType is set to allToSingle, the value of this parameter indicates the length and unit of the alert aggregation window.

parameters.name: EventTransferSwitch
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to convert an alert to an event. Valid values:

*   0: no
*   1: yes

parameters.name: EventTransferType
parameters.description:
The event generation method. Valid values:

*   default: The default method is used.
*   singleToSingle: The system generates an event for each alert.
*   allToSingle: The system generates an event for alerts within a period of time.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The ID of the rule.

parameters.name: LogSource
parameters.description: The log source of the rule.

parameters.name: LogSourceMds
parameters.description: The internal code of the log source.

parameters.name: LogType
parameters.description: The log type of the rule.

parameters.name: LogTypeMds
parameters.description: The internal code of the log type.

parameters.name: QueryCycle
parameters.description: The window length of the rule.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region in which the data management center of the threat analysis feature resides. Specify this parameter based on the regions in which your assets reside. Valid values:

*   cn-hangzhou: Your assets reside in regions in China.
*   ap-southeast-1: Your assets reside in regions outside China.

parameters.name: RoleFor
parameters.description: The ID of the account that you switch from the management account.

parameters.name: RoleType
parameters.description:
The type of the view. Valid values:
- 0: the current Alibaba Cloud account
- 1: the global account

parameters.name: RuleCondition
parameters.description: The query condition of the rule. The value is in the JSON format.

parameters.name: RuleDesc
parameters.description: The description of the rule.

parameters.name: RuleGroup
parameters.description: The log aggregation field of the rule. The value is a JSON string.

parameters.name: RuleName
parameters.description: The name of the rule.

parameters.name: RuleThreshold
parameters.description: The threshold configuration of the rule. The value is in the JSON format.

parameters.name: ThreatLevel
parameters.description:
The risk level. Valid values:

*   serious: high
*   suspicious: medium
*   remind: low
